content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend at the time and i went out to the pear on lake michigan to hang out with friends;that's what we would do on the weekend. that night we where the only ones there because a big storm was approaching from the west. it was a beautiful night no wind very calm and no waves.  we were looking at the stars, you could see millions of them when my wife said to me look at that boat out there.  when i looked i saw a light about 10miles down the lake to the southwest towards the storm and said "he better get in or he'll be in trouble" and went back to looking at the stars.  about 10-15 sec. passed and she said " were is that boat", i looked and it was not there, so i looked around. the light was past us about 5 miles to the north, that is impossible, no boat is that fast, when all of a sudden it shot up about a hundred feet and hovered for five min.  dropped back to the water then came toward us,as it got closer i saw a huge black mass but could not make out any shape.My wife got scared and wanted to go, i told her to go find someone to see this.She left "fast"telling me to come but i was to drawn to it.When it got within a hundred feet it shot away so fast it was unbelievable. i couldn't  hear anything but some thunder from the storm.It was now about ten miles away from me. it would hover off the water and sometimes look as if it would enter the water.After watching it go up and down for awhile it soon entered the storm and that was the last i saw it.We drove to town and told people but no one would believe us.The next day on the radio more people say they saw ufo over lake michigan that night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was a brite light off in the distance over lake michigan like a boat but moved to fast and raised above and below the water .The closer it got it was like a huge black mass.

content.detailedDescription: About a half hour after noon, my coworkers and i obeserved an unknown object in the great clear lake area of houston, tx. close to the nasa complex.  observed a white boomerang like object tumble through the sky in a horizontal line, descending slightly as it moved across the sky.  it seemed to get smaller as we observed it.  we looked away, for no more than five to ten seconds, looked back and it was gone.  it was moving east to west at approx. 45 degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Boomerang shape that tumbled through the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1) myself and my fiance went outside to have a cigarette at 11:53 pm cst.
2, 4) i walked outside onto the deck and saw the craft hovering just above houses about 100 yards away. it had two solid huge, bright blue led style lights on the left side, with two rows of 4 red lights of the same style and sizeabout 1/2 inch vertically separated from my view that went off like a wave on the right side of the craft from the left to the right (right and left are relative to my view; the left was the rear of the craft, where the open part of the "v" was, the right was the front, the vertex of the "v")
when i saw it my fiance was walking out right behind me and i began hitting her to gain her attention and just kept saying "hunny hunny hunny" and pointing with my other (right) hand. 
3) i immediately knew what it was because of a previous encounter with the same craft. i could make out the shape as a chevron-esque shape. 
4,6) i then watched it semi hover, possibly moving extremely slowly, then it took off straight north, covering the remaining field of my vision (about 45-50 degrees to the north from the original spot of the craft) in about 4 seconds.

 right as it went too far north for me to see any longer, i saw a plane which was heading south as i was watching the craft, turn abruptly and head north. i knew that was a plane because of the relatively dim red-white flashing, which i see on a nightly basis. 
my reaction is the same as it is any time i see the "others". it is a feeling of general fear of the unknown, but more pure elation as to what they know and what i can learn. as i have mentioned, i have had multiple sightings and a few encounters with the people. my fiance has had close encounters as well.
content.summary: Solid blue lights with red sequence hovered then flew away

content.detailedDescription: This object i have seen on many occations and have seen since then. the object appears to be matalic in color and hovers in place, and the silver object is the only one that can be seen with the naked eye and when you see the photo you can see the other objects appearing. i have more photos taken the same night.
content.summary: I saw and gray object sitting in the sky fsceing the east out towards the ocean, the object sat there in the sky i took a photo and when you see the photo other objects appear that  are green and red in color, and a line of 4 yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription: I can't say anything about what i saw because i do not remember seeing anything out of the ordinary. i was out around 8 p.M. at a strip mall and noticed the pretty color of the sky, the moon and the silhouette of the trees, so i thought i would take a picture with my phone. i didn't notice any other objects when i took the picture. when i looked at it later i noticed two white lights and some undiscernable shape to the left of the moon. they appear to be coming from the nw. i would say they were planes or helicopters, but i don't think they usually fly so close together. the airport is about 20 miles north so i don't think planes would be in that position. i don't remember hearing sound, i think that would have distracted me if i was taking the picture. i'm not sure if this is anything, i just wanted to see if somebody could look at the picture and figure out what the lights are.
content.summary: Two white lights appeared in photograph of moon

content.detailedDescription:
The sightings began one day before by my gf and her friend. they said they saw multiple things flying around their farm and causing electrical problems with their vehicles.
the next night i went to the farm and we saw multiple ufos flying around again but very high up.
as we were driving we had one of them descend down to our truck at lighting speed, then it hovered for a bit behind the truck and after 15 secs or so it flew directly beside our truck, just above the power lines.
it went past us slowly as we all just stared in awe. it sounded like very small outboard boat motor, very quiet hum. it had red blue green white lights that flashed with no specific pattern. 
it followed the powerlines and we never saw it go back up in the sky. we followed it as far as we could.
this wouldnt be the last time we saw these crafts...
after doing a ton of research i found that these crafts have been sighted since the 50's and bmw most likely makes the small engine that runs it. it only needs a small engine because it is almost weightless. apparently by spinning mercury around in a circle within a vacuum you can reduce the gravitational forces of anything within the circle. but who really knows. i know what we saw.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo sighting 1 of 5

content.detailedDescription: Was driving my son to school at 8am on sept.29th 2011 travaling south on frontage i 130 between gattis school rd and kelly lane .My son told me he could see something in the sky travaling way to fast to be a plane.We see planes all the time around here.I looked out the window towards the west and saw something in the sky zooming by as fast as a missile and leaving a vapor trail behind it. i did not see the object but my son (who is 12)said it was a solid white sphere with what appeared to be 2 wings protruding diagonaly from beneath it .He watched it descending   untill it disapeared from his view at the underpath to i45. he woundered if it was part of the satalite that fell to earth on sat.Sept.24th but did not hear anything on the local news.Has anyone else reported seeing anything?
content.summary: Solid white sphere with what appeared to be 2 wings diagonally protruding from beneath travaling extreamly fast and descending rather like a missile watched it for about 30 to 50 seconds before losing sight of it.It was to fast to be a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to mo asd by phone.  witness did not have internet access and submitted this report after giving me another report in missouri. he did not wish to leave his contact information. see his other report in missouri over 635.


"i was driving on i-35 highway at approximately 8:50 pm when i noticed a triangluar shaped craft passing over the highway in front of me at approximately 3,000-5,000 feet altitude. it was flying slower and lower than a jet aircraft would, but it appeared to be the size of a 747 or larger.  it was so odd looking that i pulled over to the shoulder to get a better look at it and watched it through binoculars.  it moved very slowly.  there were three white lights on the bottom, which did not have beams and a red light in the center.  it looked like the object was black with structure. none of the lights were flashing or pulsing.  there was no tail or wings, and i did not see a red or green light like you would on a plane.  then, two more white lights came on and the object was not in a triangle shape any longer - it was in a v shape with five white lights for a few minutes, then those lights went off, leaving the three white lights on.  it continued moving until it was out of sight.  i did not have a camera with me."
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft over i-35 highway

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, 

i���d just like to tell you about an amazing thing my wife and i saw last night.
it was just before 10.00 pm and my wife and i were sitting in our lounge watching ncis on television. the lights were off.

at the eastern end of our lounge is a large picture window which has two opening lights at the top. from this window we have a good view of the sky and often watch commercial aircraft fly over as the turn onto final approach for cardiff international airport. it has become something of a habit to keep one eye on the sky as we watch television.

i can tell you now that what flew over our house last night was no regular aircraft commercial or otherwise.

this thing came into view in the top right hand corner of our window and it was moving ��� i mean really moving. i screamed to my wife ���what the hell is that��� and she ran over to the window to get a better look.

it was blue in colour ��� the most piercing blue i���ve ever seen. it reminded me of a welder arc but deeper blue than that. it���s difficult to describe the colour accurately.
all i know is you wouldn���t confuse this thing with a meteor. i���ve watched the perseids and leonids many times and this was not the greeny-blue colour i am familiar with.
also it left no trail or streak as do meteors.

my wife and i continued to watch as this thing flew onwards in a roughly south easterly direction. my wife watched from the window, resting her elbows on the sill.
i by this time was out of my seat and standing on tip-toes trying to keep this thing in sight.

by standing on my toes i was just able to see over the muntin of the window and keep this thing in sight as it disappeared into the distance.
using the muntin and the style of the window as a sort of set square or gun sight i was able to ���track��� this thing.

it was still visible , still vivid blue and rapidly diminishing in size as the seconds ticked by and it flew into the distance.

now the spooky bit ��� actually made the hairs on my neck stand up. in relation to my improvised sight this thing began to climb, slowly at first but after a second or so it accelerated and was soon out of sight above the window frame.

my wife was able to see it for a little while longer because of her lower vantage point but it eventually disappeared from her view ���going straight up���, or so she said.

funny thing is my wife is always moaning about how she���s never seen a ufo. she was really thrilled and kept asking me what it was. i couldn���t answer her.

i went straight on the internet and checked for iss overflights and any other satellites that might have been visible but there were none.

i just hope someone else saw this thing and will report it. at least then we���ll know we���re not going mad.

shape: spherical
colour: vivid blue
direction of travel: from north west to south east.
sound: none
speed: unknown
altitude: initially 2,000 to 3,000 feet. (climbing)
duration of sighting: 25 seconds.
content.summary: Vivid blue sphere overflew house at high speed and climbed out

content.detailedDescription: It was around 7:35pm, pacific time.I had come back from picking up my kids from daycare. i parked the car in the alley and started walking towards the house. i then spotted two pulsating red lights hovering. i rushed to the house to tell my mom. she was inside watching her primetime show. we ran outside and that is when we notice that there were more red lights pulsating. we grab the camera and started filming. they started to go left towards palmdale. then we spotted the next set of pulsating lights. behind the first object. we also recorded that object. we noticed that a white solid light followed the red lights. after we lost sight of the objects, we heard helicopters and other crafts flying around.
content.summary: Object, or objects they were more than 4 pulsating red lights hovering. they headed towards palmdale.

content.detailedDescription: We were on the patio after veiwing fireworks and shooting a few of our  the whole neighborhood was out side shooting fireworks apx 1hr latet these  huge orangey gold objects with glowing pulsating objects heading towards chicago from the sw. moved sloely in a triangle formation while smaller diamond colored/lit object came from different areas were like all over at different speeds and altitudes. moved with formation. there was far off in the distance up in the sky a large brite object also. we were in shock and watched the objects as they went over the gary international airport heading towards chicago
content.summary: Orange/ gold shere shaped objects in a triangle formation coming from sw heading north directly over gary internatipnal airport towards chicago some smaller crafts emerged from everywhere were moving around the sky randomly along with the large formation

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving westward on meredith drive in urbandale, ia around the 7400 block at 10:18pm on july 30, 2011.  my daughter was looking out the passenger window looking to the north, and she saw something in the sky.  she said, "look dad."  i leaned over but couldn't see it at first.  then i leaned farther over and could see it out of her window.  it was a reddish-orange light in the sky about the size of my small finger's fingernail.  it hovered in the sky and did not move.  it was approximately between 30 degrees and 40 degrees above the horizontal.  i could almost make out a disk shape on the right edge of it. the light covered the entire object.  it glowed reddish-orange.  it almost seemed as if it were on fire.  but it wasn't.  we drove westward and kept our eyes on it.  i turned north on a side street at approximately the 8900 block of meredith drive so i could stop the car and get a better look at it.  once i spotted it again, it appeared to be moving northward, away from us.  it was much smaller now.  the size of a star, but still red in color.  we could see it moving away from us at incredible speeds.  it stayed at the same altitude.  my daughter's friend who was watching the stars that night told my daughter that he had seen this reddish object that same night also.  he was a few miles north of us at saylorville lake.  the event lasted about 5 minutes.  it was over by 10:23pm.
content.summary: Reddish-orange light in sky, hovered for 5 minutes then sped northward

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the patio this evening. first i saw what looked like a star moving from west to slightly north east. it was only a small white light moving in a straight line. as it moved, it faded and finally disappeared. then just seconds after that, another identical light came from the same western place in the sky, moved the same direction and also faded and then disappeared. as i was looking for another light to show up, i noticed what looked like a "shadow" in the sky in the same place that the lights had come from. it did not have any lights, and was barely different in color than the sky, but slightly lighter. it may been reflecting the ambient western light? there were no clouds. it was large, boomerang in shape, except that the back side was curved, making the front part wider that a boomerang and the ends were more tapered. it did not make any sound. it was larger than any large aircraft i have ever seen. it started out heading from west to slightly northeast, like the lights, but then headed south.

i live near offutt airforce base, and i have seen stealth bombers and they make a very loud sound. this was not one of those. i have no idea what it was that i saw. but i am very impressed with the shadow or almost transparent appearance, how large it was and that it made no sound. it seemed to be moving at the same speed as the lights that came before it. this was not fast, but almost like the speed of an airplane coming in for a landing
content.summary: Boomerang in shape. back side was more curved. ends were more tapered

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en el estacionamiento de la universidad, tomando un descanso entre clases, estaba acostado cuando de repente observe una luz destellante en el cielo, al principio pense que eran globos, al ponerle atencion note que estaba demasiado alto, (incluso tres veces mas arriba que un avion) por la altura supongo q era un objeto muy grande, un avion paso por ahi muy por debajo del objeto, el objeto seguia moviendose, se metia entre las nubes, abri la toma del zoom para apreciar la altura y casi pierdo de foco el objeto, finalmente se perdio en el cielo dicho objjeto. durante el evento todo era normal no hubo ruidos extra���os ni nada por el estilo al principio no le tome importancia, despues me entro duda de que puede ser, soy estudiante de ingenieria robotica y me cuesta creer en estos fenomenos, pero definitivamente no tengo idea de q fue =s
content.summary: Objeto volador con destello de luz, grabado en el estacionamiento de la universidad

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back patio watching sheet lightning in the western sky. as i was looking up i clearly saw a solid cigar shaped, illuminated object traveling somewhat faster than a commercial aircraft. it was so clear that i immediately saw that it lacked any fixed wing , rotor, tail or navigation lights. this object was even more clear each time lightning struck, though it was very clear even without it. i watched it travel along a straight course for about 1- 1 1/2 minutes at which time it abruptly turned on a dime to the east. i waited for it to pass some sparse pine tree limbs. i watched for at least 6 or 7 more minutes but the object vanished.
 this was no anomaly. it was exceptionally easy to see. i have watched the skies for the better part of my adult life (i'm 62)and have had more than just a passing interest in ufo's. i have never seen one before this. i knew immediately that it was a ufo.
content.summary: During a sheet lightning display i was staring at the western sky when i clearly saw a cigar shaped object moving at a speed over  500 mph. it path was straight for a short time and then abruptly turned east. i continued to watch but it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported by phone to asd: 

i was traveling north on 635 highway north of kansas city, missouri at 11:30 pm after finishing a job when i noticed an orange fireball object east of my position above the tree line and moving towards me.  the object was moving at a slow rate of speed. i pulled over to the side of the road in order to get a better look at it and was upset that i did not have a camera or video camera with me.  it moved slowly overhead and towards the west - towards kansas.  it went out of sight again at the tree line.  it was the size of my thumb at arm's length.  the object was an orange color and pulsated. i did not hear any sound as it went over.  a plane came over at approximately the same height moments later and i could hear it clearly. i've never seen anything like this and wonder if anyone else saw this object.
content.summary: Orange fireball over highway

content.detailedDescription:
In 1995 i was living in el paso tx during that time i was working as a machinist and like witter at golden corral restauran at nigth that date was thanks guiving big reasson to not forgot. during that time i was living in my truck (a chevy truck 1962 with camper ) i use to been park it in front of the machine shop i been working during the day wich was in that time ubicated about half mile a way from golden corral. 
so after finished my shift in the restaurant i drove back to my coustomary place to rest i decide to praid for thanks to god it was a good tiping night and other "reassons i did have in that time " i did focoused my eyes at the sky i just start my oracion and sudenly emerge a whit ball at the thistance bijaind of the machine shop biulding about 100 yards distance at that moment i did notice a figure inside my reaccion was irrace my arms an scrime to called his attention but i dont know wy but i couldent at any time i did not feel scarry the n i decide to walk to the encounter of the thing then i walk to this but my sorprise was when i was closse to him about 10 or 15 feet above my head it or he watever it was ignorest me like i was'nt there he just kip flouting at the same altitud and at the same speed until it just was a small ligt at the distance .
af ter this event i allso saw a big mirror in the sky clousing like a window it happens at the same city elpaso tx .You can imvestigate the location is on lee trevino av i was working in golden corral and the machine shop was closed to golds gym which is about half mile a way. any way this is par of my story now i am living in ventura ca an i allso have experiences same tipe maive some day you wuold like to lisento me 9 for me advances tecnologie is all ready owed to goverments like usa but at the same time some tecnologies from outher space is trying to showing more about creation of the universe . thanks for this and i just feel like i need to sher this experiences (lo que quiero compartirles es que ellos no estan aqui para lastimarnos ellos quieren que el equilibrio en el universo no se altere y eso se deve a que todo tiene un tiempo para cumplirse y su trabajo es cuidar de que asi sea. amedida de que nuestra capasidad de respeto a lo creado cresca *llegara el tiempo*) 
translation above
i want to share is that they're not here to hurt us they want the balance in the universe is not altered and it is to deve everything has a time to meet and work is taking care of so be it. amedida that our layers of respect for the created cresca * arrival time *)
content.summary: About 20 feet abobe my head it was flouting ( like a wite sfera sombady inside)

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i went outside our alliance oh area home on the night of november 3, 2009 at about 11pm to star gaze and talk.
 it was a cool crisp cloudless night.The stars were really twinkling and changing colors,we were even joking around about them being ufos and how we wouldn't ever be lucky enough to see a ufo.
 not long after the conversation started my wife jumps really close to me and says "what is that" and points straight up.I immediatlly look upwards and my eyes are instantly drawn to a black glider or boomerrang shapped craft heading south at a high rate of speed,i'm talking thousands of mph.Then we notice another one a couple seconds later, then another.
 they all were 15000-25000 feet up,silent,black and fast...Real fast,like nothing i've ever seen before.They were out of site almost as soon as we spotted them,we only could focus on them long enough to make out the shape and color and to notice that they didn't have any lights.The only way that we could see them is because they were so black and the fact that the sky's backdrop was lit up so bright from all the stars.
 as the event happened i was trying to rationalize what i saw,was it a jet,milatary...? as i collected the information in my mind i could come to only one unbeleivable conclusion...Ufo.
 we had mixed emotions as we laid in bed that night talking about what we had seen.We were excited about it but also scarred because in our eyes that question of is there aliens and real ufos had been answered and we didn't know if we were ready to accept that knowledge.
 i still think of that night and my heart kind of skips a beat or two when i relize that we arn't alone...But we must accept it.
content.summary: 3 black

content.detailedDescription:
My bff & i were jade hunting at sand dollar beach in big sur, ca. we stayed until after sunset, so it was dark when we headed up the stairs to go home. we went up the first flight of stairs and stopped to rest, as we looked out at the ocean. i noticed a strange bright white light hovering over the water. i asked my gf what it was and she thought it was the oncoming car lights from the hiway up above us. i informed her it was not because the hiway is directly behind us not in front of us or to the right side of us! we acknowledged the light and it darted away. then i said,"dont be shy!" (of course i was kidding)then it reappeared and got brighter, it seemed to blink when we talked to it. then it blinked from white to blue to red. we started to get scared so we decided to leave. my intuition and sixth sense became overwhelmingly strong. i felt a premonition...I knew something was going to happen. i knew something was waiting for us at the top of the trail. i was reluctant to leave but my gf encouraged me. she reminded me how late it was and we had a 2hr drive ahead of us back to monterey bay. she lead us up the staircase to the trail, all we had was our cell phones used as flashlights. once the staircase ended we continued up to the dirt trail. im really scared and holding onto her by the back of her shirt with one eye open. then we see a light, it looked like a flashlight shining threw  the trees and bushes. it looked like someone jogging down the trail towards us with a flashlight/spotlight shining randomly. i had a sign of relief for a minute thinking it was a person, but as it got closer it then looked like a miners hat with a bright white spotlight. we both then realized it wasn't human and it wanted to communicate. i spoke to it and said, "i don't understand what you are trying to say to us because your not human and dont speak our language!" then it got closer, the miners spotlight hat turned into a boomerang/triangle with the bright white spotlight. it started to touch down, but with white tenticles/strings hanging from it that started to take human form. thats when the 3 points of the triangle materialized into 3 beings & 3 lights!! white light turned into an animal, blue light turned into a  lady with long black hair overweight wearing a blue dress, and the red light turned into a man in a red outfit. we asked them if they were friendly? right when they completely took form and hit the ground,they immediately rushed us and ran full-force towards us!! 
that is not friendly!!!! we did not like that at all!!!! 
we started praying! my gf kept repeating the lords prayer. i called upon god to cover us with jesus's precious blood and protect us from all evil!!! i called upon my guardian angels to wrap their beautiful wings around us and keep us safe!! 
within an instant they disappeared!!! i still remember the look of fear on the lady's face...Very creepy!!! 
not sure if they are aliens or spirits!? maybe their cousins, lol!!
we continued to see them above the ocean on our left side on our drive home. i have some video footage of it. i also have pictures of the beach before we left. my pictures have alot of orbs in them. very strange!
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: My bff & i were jade hunting at sand dollar beach in big sur ca. after sunset we went up the first flight of stairs to leave. we stopped to look at the ocean. we saw a strange blinking white/blue/red light over the water

content.detailedDescription: Standing on patio 5 floors up at my residence and saw a group of yellow/orange, pulsating/flikering lights moving slowly in formation overhead at low altitude. as i have never seen anything comparable in my life, i had no idea what this was. at the time i saw it my reaction was confusion, curiosity, and shock. i saw the lights almost directly above my position for about 15 to 20 seconds and finally the passed out of view behind the building in which i live.
content.summary: 12 to 15 yellow/orange lights moving in rigid formation over bldg first single file and then some simple patterns (triangle) at end appeared to be connected moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was having something bother me when i went backpacking alone all the time so i set up a game camera and caught an orb  flying at then over the camera (visible),where it then descended on me(not visible) the orb then rocketed away being caught in the last shot. they are inter dimentional.
content.summary: Orb shoots down out of sky and embraces me ,rockets away.

content.detailedDescription: While in our front yard waiting for our son to come pick up our grand daughter my wife spotted this star like object in our north center sky. it seemed strange as it was day time and the sun was shinning beautifully. i had my grand daughter get my binoculars from the house to see it better. by that time our son and his wife arrived to pick up our grand daughter, finding us all looking at something in the sky. using the binoculars the object looked like a round white circle about the size of a bb, it just seemed to stay in one place with little or no movement. i couldn't tell how high up this object was. at the same time, my daughter in law was watching it with the binoculars and the rest of us just watching it without, the object disappeared, gone. but my daughter in law saw something a little different as she had the binoculars, the object shot off to the west, which the rest of us were unable to see and it happened in a split second. this sighting lasted roughly 7 minutes. our grand daughter was so excited as she also watched it, with and without the binoculars!
content.summary: Star like object that looks like a round white sphere with binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: Iv seam to be connected to them for some time now.Every time i scope the mountians out i see 4 to5 ships on the ground 1 to7 days after that there are gone but then i see new ones in different plases. 5 days ago i saw one that blinded me for about 1 hour with a gold light.The nex day it was gone. i realy dont understand it all 2 days ago i talk to the police about them one said to call them when i have one so i called the police becuse i found one they told me to call a ufo network so that is what i am doing. i found that there is a place in the foot hill in ojai that there area number of them that they are there when i get close to a ship on the ground there are several reasons i cant get close enought to touch then,one is my feet are glue to the ground ten feet away, another is they fill my mind with terrer as if i am going to be eating by something other than they earth a garding that is pertecting them. i under stand that if i get beon there gard and get close enough to tough one of there ships that maybe i might be able to connect to them a may be one with them and to under stand why i am so atracted to them. all i can do right now is to keep a eye on them and wate for the opertunaty for them to have me for there guest but untill then i going to have that barrier.One day they will come for me i will disapeir people will look for me for a wile then they will give up and forget me.I use to worry about it but now i am ready for them to take me i know now that i am ready to give up my life if that is what it takes to be able to be with them to travel to space but i hope that i wantto be in my body alive and well but now i am ready for what ever they want of me. thanks for lissening to me for what i have to say i dont know any more i was told not to mess with them buti cant stand it any more to see them and no one belives me. as of today every time i see one i well do everthing i can to tough them even if it kills me i dont care any more i wont be afraid of them any more i have nothing to live for anymore
content.summary: There are numerus landing zones around the foot hills of ojai.Some reason they come and go, iv been studing them for some time every day for a long time

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were sitting on a secluded part of the beach several miles south of yachats, oregon. the sky was clear, and i spent much of the evening looking up at the stars. i am a ufo enthusiast, but also a skeptic, and was hoping to see aircraft of any kind (human-made or not) because of the great visibility. my companion isn't a ufo enthusiast and is more skeptical than me, but he acknowledged he saw something odd last night.

we didn't have a clock on us, but i believe it was around 9 p.M. when i glanced up and saw a series of lights moving above and slightly to the north of us. the object was about the size of a golf ball at arm's length when it was flying over us, slightly to the northwest out toward the pacific ocean.

the craft's lights were in the approximate shape of an arrow, with three steady, white-yellow lights forming a chevron at the front of the craft. at least one or two of the same type of lights formed the shape of a narrower, fuselage-type "arrow shaft" in the middle. at the back of the craft, a pair of the same lights extended out again like another chevron pointing in the same direction as the front of the craft. on the rear of the craft was a single red light, the same size as the white-yellow lights, only this one was blinking at a rate of about every other second.

the two of us walked further out on the beach to get a better look at the craft, as we both realized it didn't look like a conventional aircraft. we looked but did not see any flashing green or white faa-regulation navigation or anti-collision lights.

the craft continued over us toward the northwest but eventually made what appeared to be a wide arc and began flying south down the coast, several miles out to sea (i am not good at estimating distance so cannot say how far out it was). the craft, when viewed at a distance from the side, looked like a stereotypical "flying saucer" with a series of white lights flying in a row.

the craft appeared to continue flying to the southwest, further out to the ocean. as it flew further away and out of sight, i was able to keep my eyes on the single blinking red light as it moved further out to sea. eventually it faded away out to the southwest, and we didn't see any other aircraft that night.

i'm not sure if the craft made any noise because we were right next to the ocean and waves, which were very loud.
content.summary: Low-flying, arrow-shaped craft with steady white-yellow lights and one flashing red light

content.detailedDescription: For the past 3 to 4 months blinking colored lights in sky. at first just saw a couple then over a period of a couple weeks started seeing more. now the are in triangle formations. there have hardly moved in three months there are at least 12 of them now. can see them ever night they are noticeable before the stars are. there flash in colors at same time. i love to go out and watch them. my son koty said he  thinks they are so cool to watch flash. we wish we had a better telescope to see them better. you can see the color change with your bare eyes. i do not have a camera that can get a picture that far away.
content.summary: Flashing lights now in formations

content.detailedDescription: It goes like this; it was in the summer of 1972 or 1973, i was sitting on my aunt's porch swing after well after sundown, i was facing the west and the object that i saw was moving from the south to the north and lasted for about 10 minutes. imagine if you will what a heart beat looks like on a monitor, that is the flight pattern that the object had. it was flying level, then shot up and then back down at least three times with a level flight path in between each change of altitude just like you would see on a heart beat monitor. now being a child and not really knowing about flight characteristics of aircraft, satelites, meteors, etc i had no idea what i was looking at. but now, i definitely know that it was not any of those things. so what was it? as far as i know i have not seen anything since. but i have been interested in ufos ever since.
content.summary: Vehicle travelling south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside at about 2am or so to make sure my car was locked, and i seen this weird blue glowing orb , shooting across the sky towards a stationary white orb and a weird redish glowing orb and then if that wasnt weird i watched the blue orb shoot off something that look like a beam or something at the red orb then the red orb kinda shot off for abt 30 secs and the white or turned a redish color all about the same time and the blue and red or started what looked like shooting lights at each other after about 1 minute of this i watched the sky in the direction kinda flash like thunder for abt 5 seconds and these things were moving in weird directions stopping and then changing direction, after the flashing the red orb was gone and a second orb appeared it was red also i assume it was the first red orb that dissapeared. and they both shot off toward the ne , all of this sorta lasted id say 5 minutes. was kinda like a dogfight.
content.summary: Watch a weird dogfight of sorts

content.detailedDescription: I went out in my backyard at night time and looked up in the sky, i saw a moving light that was very faint and looked really far away. at first i thought it was an airplane or satellite, but then i noticed it was moving way to fast as it went from one end of the horizon to the other in a matter of about 3-5 minutes. what was strange about it is that it was changing direction by about 5-20 degrees at a time and was moving at changing speeds, like a swimmer doing a breast stroke, moving fast then slowing down, then moving fast again. i noticed that my roommate was in the kitchen so i went and got him and he witnessed it too. eventually it went out of sight beyond the horizon.
content.summary: Light moving across horizon, changing direction, speeding up and slowing down.

content.detailedDescription: I and four other persons were taking a late night drive at about 12:30 am out in the country.  we turned onto a outer city road and were only driving for about 10 minutes when we saw a blimp-like object about 200 yards to our left and about 500 yards in altitude. there was a single row of lights that went all around the object that stayed illuminated and were bright white. there was a flashing blue and white light atop of the object. we followed that object for about a mile. i was not driving at this point, so i continued to search the sky for other objects. the first object made no noise at all. the second object, i spotted first. it was a few miles away and was covered by a cloud. it appeared to have a bright white light that was pulsating. i could only see the lights behind the cloud which looked to be heat lightning. then the object came from behind the clouds and realized that what i thought was heat lightning was really the light on top of the object. we then turned right onto another country road and after following the two original objects for about 5 or 6 miles several of us spotted about 5 more aircraft surrounding us. we pulled over and got out of the car when the original ufo was coming directly towards us. when it was about 100 ft away from us and 100 ft in altitude it made the strongest winds i have ever felt in my life. strong enough to almost knock me on my feet. the noise emenating from the object was loud enough for me to cover my ears. it then went to directly overhead and we tried to videotape the object but nothing showed up on the film. it sped off at speeds unimaginable. we then got back in the car and drove towards the other 6 or 7 objects that were still in the sky. i was driving at this point because the original driver wanted to try to film this on her phone. i felt compelled to follow the objects. once we had been driving for about 15 more minutes, we pulled over again in an open area. when we got out of the car this time, we counted about 15 objects in about a mile radius around us. we again tried to document the objects but the audio was the only legible thing in the video. at this point we looked in the fields around us and spotted several(5 or 6)objects on the ground about a mile away. they were about 100 ft tall. they had rows of lights on them. the rows were vertical. the first row had red lights. the second had white. the third had a bluish light. they all flashed in sequence and were all perfectly similiar with one another. the flashing also was in sequence with the white flash of the objects in the air. after standing outside for about 30 minutes we got back into the vehicle to see if we could find a roadway that got us closer to the landed objects. when we began to drive again, every one of our phones died. not at the same time, but in succession. then it began to rain, but the rain was only falling on the drivers side of the car. we followed the objects for another 30 minutes and saw several of them coming very close to our vehicle. we stopped in the middle of the road at some sort of country road intersection with a run down convenience store. this time when we were out of the vehicle, one of the ufos flew about 50 ft above our heads. this object was triangular in shape and about 100 feet in length. the object was solid with what looked like weird carvings that looked like some sort of circuitry. it reminded me of a computer chip. there was a bright white light on each corner of the triangle. it got directly above our head, but this made a buzzing sound. when it was there, it hovered and ascended slightly at an angle and then its two back lights went out. it then elevated rapidly and then a red light appeared and the lights were flashing. at this point it looked like an ordinary airplane. there was a second one that came close to us at this point that was disc-like in shape. it came within a hundred yards of us and looked to be about 50 feet in diameter. it had a greyish-black color for the base of the aircraft. it seem to spin as it moved away from us. this one also had a white pulsating light at the base and the top. the third object that we saw at this point was about 100 yards above us. it was trapezoid-like shaped and on the side of it, it had the same patterned row of lights as the aircraft we saw landed earlier. it, too, pulsated in sequence with the other objects that we could see in the distance in the sky. this object was about 150 feet in length. while this one was hovering about 100 yards above us and about 100 yards away, another one seemed to appear and disappear behind it. the one that appeared, appeared as a orb of some sort that looked to me as if it was caught on fire. i believed at this point, that it had malfunctioned and blown itself up because before it disappeared, it appeared to be descending rapidly. when the object that looked to be on fire disappeared, so did all of the others. that is how we lost sight of the objects. this time that we were out of our vehicles felt like it lasted 10 minutes, but i think it was really about 45 minutes. at this point, we were about 45 minutes to an hour away from lawrenceburg, ky. on the drive back , we all felt very anxious, and for the first time since we saw the first object, frightened. it was about 4 in the morning at this time. on the drive back, we didn't spot another object in the sky. at every time that we exited the vehicle to get a better look, there were no visible stars in the area directly above us. it was completely dark. the whole sighting was about three and half hours long as i remember it now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: Sighted 30+ ufos circling the vehicle. the ufos hovered and had flashing lights that seemed to pulsate

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the living room, right next to the large sliding glass door/window. as i was watching a movie, i notice an incredibly bright glow out of the corner of my eye. i turned and looked (but not through the glass, the door was open so there was no reflection,) and witnessed a large white globe of light. it had a lime green glowing outline, with what appeared to be neon green flames coming off of it. it had a long tale, that left mini trails as it went along. it was going north east, made no sound, and appeared to be about the size of a two story house. and that was from about one to two miles away.

it lasted about seven to ten minutes, and i lost site of it when it disappeared behind some homes.
content.summary: Glowing ball of light with lime and neon green flames
